snippet: President Obama said a new package of legislation would make it easier for millions of homeowners to refinance at today’s historically low interest rates.
abstract: Pres Obama says a new package of legislation will make it easier for millions of homeowners to refinance at current historically low interest rates; contends that homeowners will have chance to save about $3,000 a year on their mortgage.
